phrases: Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony.
Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.
Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them.
But when the world needed him most, he vanished.
A hundred years passed, and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar...
And although his airbending skills are great.
He has a lot to learn before he is ready to save anyone.
But I believe Aang can save the world.
I am not one to complain, but cannot Appa fly any higher?
I have an idea, why do not we all get on your back and you can fly us to the North Pole?
Climb on everyone, Sokka's ready for takeoff!
Look, we are all just a little tired and cranky...
We cannot even find the Northern Water Tribe.
The Avatar needs to master waterbending.
He is looking for a teacher.
Then what are we waiting for?
This is not some little Earth village we can just march into.
The Water Tribe is a great nation.
There is a reason they have survived a hundred years of war.
The landscape itself is an icy fortress.
We will need a massive invasion force.
I cannot believe how many waterbenders live up here!
We will find a master to teach us, no problem!
Tonight, we celebrate the arrival of our brother and sister from the Southern Tribe,...
We also celebrate my daughter's 16th birthday.
Yue is now of marrying age.
May the great Ocean and Moon Spirits watch over us during these troubled times.
Now, Master Pakku and his students will perform!
So... uh... you are a Princess, huh?!
You know, back in my tribe, I am kind of like a Prince myself!
I am trying to have a conversation here!
So it looks like I am going to be in town for awhile.
I am thinking maybe we could... do an activity together?
Master Pakku, meet your newest student, the Avatar.
Just because you are destined to save the world, do not expect any special treatment.
My friend and I cannot wait to start training with you...
If you want to relax, then I suggest visiting a tropical island.
If not, I will see you both at sunrise.
For the last time, I am not playing the sumki horn.
No, it is about our plans.
There is a bit of a problem.
I have recruited them for a little expedition to the North Pole.
Sorry you will not be there to watch me capture the Avatar.
But I cannot have you getting in my way again.
I did not know you were skilled with broadswords, Prince Zuko.
Have you heard of the Blue Spirit, General Iroh?
I do not think he is real.
He is a criminal, an enemy of the Fire Nation.
But I have a feeling that justice will catch up with him soon.
General Iroh, the offer to join my mission still stands if you change your mind.
I have waited for this day my whole life!
I finally get to learn from a real waterbending master!
No, please, march right in, I am not concentrating or anything.
Uhh... this is my friend, Katara, the one I told you about?
I think there is been a misunderstanding.
You did not tell me your friend was a girl.
In our tribe, it is forbidden for women to learn waterbending.
What do you mean you will not teach me?
I did not travel across the entire world so you could tell me no!
But there must be other female waterbenders in your tribe!
Here the women learn from Yugoda to use their waterbending to heal.
I am sure she would be happy to take you as her student despite your bad attitude.
I do not want to heal, I want to fight!
But our tribe has customs, rules.
If you will not teach Katara, then...
Then I will not learn from you!
I am sure you will do a great job.
You cannot risk your training for me.
You have to learn from Master Pakku.
Even if he is a big jerk.
Why do not we get started then?
Hey, how about that picnic last night?
Boy, your Dad sure knows how to throw a party.
I am happy you enjoyed yourself.
Well, it was not as much fun after you left.
So, I am still hoping we can see more of each other.
I will meet you on that bridge tonight.
That is okay, it was worth it.
You all seem highly qualified for the mission I have in mind.
What do you need us to do?
I believe you are acquainted with Prince Zuko?
Are you here for the healing lesson?
You are moving the water around, but you are not feeling the push and pull.
Maybe that move is too advanced for you.
Why do not you try an easier one?
So, who is the lucky boy?
Ah, no, I do not think I am ready for that yet.
My grandmother gave my mother this necklace,...
I do not know why I did not realize sooner!
You are the spitting image of Kana!
Wait, how do you know my Gran Gran's name?
When I was about your age I was friends with Kana.
She was born here, in the Northern Tribe.
Your grandmother had an arranged marriage with a young waterbender.
He carved that necklace for her.
If Gran Gran was engaged, why did she leave?
That is always been a mystery to me.
The crew wanted me to wish you safe travels.
It is a lovely night for a walk.
Why do not you join me?
Or, just stay in your room and sit in the dark.
Actually, it is suppose to be a fish, see it has a fin.
I should not have asked you to come here!
One minute she wants to go out with me and the next she is telling me to get lost!
Master Poophead will not teach her because she is a girl.
Why do not you just teach her, Aang?
Why did not I think of that?
At night, you can teach me whatever moves you learned from Master Pakku.
That way you have someone to practice with and I get to learn waterbending.
Master Pakku said this move is all about sinking and floating.
You have disrespected me, my teachings, and my entire culture.
What do you want me to do?
Force Master Pakku to take Aang back as his student?
I suspect he might change his mind if you swallow your pride and apologize to him.
No way am I apologizing to a sour old man like you!
I will be outside... if you are man enough to fight me!
I am sure she did not mean that.
I am devastated to hear about Prince Zuko.
The Fire Lord will not be pleased when he learns who was responsible.
You know who... was behind the attack?
We had a run in with them awhile back.
So, have you reconsidered my offer?
It will be an honor to serve as your general.
You are not going to win this fight!
You do not have to do this for me.
I am not doing it for you!
Someone needs to slap some sense into that guy!
So, you decided to show up?
Are not you going to fight?
Go back to the healing huts with the other women where you belong.
You want to learn to fight so bad, study closely!
Do not worry, I am not going to hurt you!
But you still will not teach me, will you?
No it is not, it is mine!
I made this sixty years ago... for the love of my life.
My Gran Gran was supposed to marry you?
Zhao does not suspect a thing.
You did not have to do this.
No nephew of mine is going to stow away on a ship without some backup!
Stay hidden until we get to the North Pole and the Avatar will be yours!
I carved this necklace for your grandmother when we got engaged.
I thought we would have a long, happy life together.
But she did not love you, did she?
Gran Gran would not let your tribe's stupid customs run her life.
It must have taken a lot of courage.
What do you want from me?
I just want you to know, I think you are beautiful...
No, no, see, that is the thing.
I think I do understand now.
You are a princess, and I... I am just a southern peasant.
You do not have to say anything.
I will see ya around, okay?
Okay, now I am really confused!
But, we cannot be together... and not for the reason you think.
Keep practicing and maybe you will get it by the time you are my age!
What do you think you are doing?
Set a course for the Northern Water Tribe.
